data.name: Brick by Boring Brick - Mathematical expression  interpreter
data.description:
### Description
You must implement the function ```int```, which takes a mathematical expression and returns the result after evaluating it. This Kata is based on [this Kata](https://www.codewars.com/kata/52a78825cdfc2cfc87000005/javascript), which you should have completed before attempting this one.
* Number may be integers or decimals.
* Operators in order of precedence ```-```, ```+```, ```*```, ```/```. 
* Evaluation from left-to-right.
* Parentheses have highest precedence
* Whitespace is ignored
* No validation required

### Rules
* No using eval, function constructor, or generators
* Your code must contain these strings exactly
  * ```/g),```
  * ```/igs,"")```
  * ```String```
  * ```bobmarley```
* Your code may not contain whitespace characters apart from where specified below.
* Your code must be formatted strictly as follows (where # is a space, and _ is any other character):
```
#_________________#_________________#_________________#_________________#
_________#_________________#_________________#_________________#_________
#_________________#_________________#_________________#_________________#
_________#_________________#_________________#_________________#_________
#_________________#_________________#_________________#_________________#
```
